headline: Pine Labs gets warm market welcome on $440M India IPO despite a valuation trim
summary: Pine Labs, backed by PayPal and Mastercard, gained 14% on its market debut.

headline: A Fresh Look at Mastercard (MA) Valuation After Recent Modest Share Price Movement
summary: Mastercard (MA) stock has seen mild movement recently, with shares slipping just over 1% in the past month. The company continues to demonstrate solid yearly returns, which may interest investors keeping an eye on steady, long-term growth. See our latest analysis for Mastercard. Looking past the minor pullback, Mastercard’s 1-year total shareholder return stands at 7.4%, with its 5-year total return hitting 71.2%. This is a clear sign momentum has stayed in its corner even as short-term share...

headline: Capital One Debit-Card Users Aren’t All Happy After the Switch to Discover
summary: The bank is moving its debit cards over from the Mastercard network after completing its acquisition of Discover earlier this year.

raw.headline: Capital One Debit-Card Users Aren’t All Happy After the Switch to Discover

headline: Should F.N.B.'s (FNB) Cross-Border Payments Push Shift the Outlook for Its Growth Story?
summary: F.N.B. Corporation recently declared a quarterly cash dividend of US$0.12 per share, payable December 15, 2025, to shareholders of record as of December 1, 2025. Earlier this week, FNB and Mastercard jointly launched Globba™, a cross-border payments solution powered by Mastercard Move, aimed at streamlining and securing international remittances for South Africans to more than 120 countries. We’ll explore how this technology-driven expansion into cross-border payments could influence...
